name: Run (itch) (sergio moura)
description:
A simple timed run game where you collect items with a limited time.

Use the keyboard arrows to move around.

The location of the items around the screen changes every day! Come back for a new challenge tomorrow!!

Future updates: Online high scores and ranking

Assets credits:

  • Graphics by Krishna Palacio - https://krishna-palacio.itch.io/
  • Fonts by somepx - https://somepx.itch.io/
  • Sound effects by jdwasabi - https://jdwasabi.itch.io/
